Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 61st overall pick, by Oakland in 1986...
Injured on 5/7/1987 with a Bruised Hip, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/7/1987 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1988, off Luis DeLeon (BOS)...
Injured on 4/24/1988 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Hit first career homerun on 8/13/1989, off Tommy Boggs (TEX)...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/9/1994 to a 2-year deal worth $570,000 per year...
